FullTitle: New species of Leptocera Olivier in the burrows of the pocket gopher, Geomys Bursarius Illinoensis Komarek and Spencer, found in Illinois (Diptera: Sphaeroceridae) [by] O.W. Richards.

articles.title: New species of Leptocera Olivier in the burrow of the pocket gopher, Geomys bursarius iltinoensis Komareck & Spencer, found in Illinois. (Diptera: Sphaeroceridae)
